channel.title: library on Documentation for Rnssp R Markdown Templates

item.title: List available templates
item.description: Rnssp R Markdown templates are being designed and released regularly. All available templates can be explored on the publicly accessible Rnssp RMD templates Github repository. The Rnssp R package provides various utility functions to easily manage templates. One of those utility functions is the Rnssp::list_templates() function. First, load the Rnssp R package: # Load the Rnssp package library(Rnssp) Next, get the current list of available packages: # List all available templates list_templates() To get a tabular and more detailed view of the available templates, run:
